member.summary: Represents a coordinate. Please note that all mahjong tiles will occupy 4 coordinates in total.

member.summary: Indicates the first position that can fill with a new tile in downward direction.

member.name: M:Puzzles.MahjongMatching.Concepts.Coordinate.Overlaps(Puzzles.MahjongMatching.Concepts.Coordinate)
member.summary: Determine whether the current coordinate overlaps with the specified coordinate.
member.param: The other coordinate to be checked.
member.returns: A result indicating whether they are overlapped with each other.

member.name: M:Puzzles.MahjongMatching.Concepts.Coordinate.IsNextTo(Puzzles.MahjongMatching.Concepts.Coordinate)
member.summary: Determine whether the coordinate is near to the specified one.
member.param: The other coordinate to be checked.
member.remarks:
There're two kind of "near":
1) .--.--. | | | '--'--' t1 t2
2) .--. | |--. '--| | '--' t1 t2
From two cases, we can know that the X coordinate value satisfies the equation |x1 - x2| <= 1, and Y coordinate value satisfies the equation |y1 - y2| <= 2.

member.name: M:Puzzles.MahjongMatching.Concepts.Coordinate.AsMask
member.summary: Converts the current instance as mask that can be used in bit operations.

target.name: method
target.summary: Provides an easy way to concatenate output members inside a or a type.
target.returns: A value indicating whether the method should be consumed by compiler, by implementing to-string method .

remarks.para: This method won't emit type name and curly brackets. If you want to customize emit text, you can only change values inside a pair of brackets.

member.name: P:Puzzles.MahjongMatching.Concepts.Puzzle.AvailableTiles
member.summary: Returns available tiles that can be used for matching.
member.remarks:
Please note that there're two possible cases to be checked:
Whether a tile is under a tile
Whether a tile is free from both left and right side
For the second point, we may not check up and down side.
